descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------
[size=5pt]Description[/size]
--------------------------------------
Protect the actor with a unique attribute
Cast spells to start or end

--------------------------------------
[size=5pt]Installation[/size]
--------------------------------------
Recommend mod manager tools
to Data folder install

- Requires -

[u]Skyrim 1.9.32.0.8[/u]
[u]Dawnguard[/u]
[u]Dragonborn[/u]

--------------------------------------
[size=5pt]Uninstallation[/size]
--------------------------------------
Delete after protection deactivate
Clean save is unnecessary

--------------------------------------
[size=5pt]Compatible[/size]
--------------------------------------
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23491]Unofficial Dawnguard Patch[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31083]Unofficial Dragonborn Patch[/url]

Compatibility with other many Mods

--------------------------------------
[size=5pt]Now bug[/size]
--------------------------------------
Protection is active to during brawl.
>Please Deactivate the protection.

--------------------------------------
[size=5pt]Update[/size]
--------------------------------------
install after delete

--------------------------------------
[size=5pt]ToDo[/size]
--------------------------------------
non DLC ver and DG only and DB only
author: yukimati
